participant_1.background:
I have to work, but I'm bringing my blender to make my own iced coffee!
I sometimes neglect my own needs in order to be there for my kids.
i studied business as my major.
I enjoy wearing comfortable, loose clothing that allows me to move around easily in my wheelchair.
I'm a teacher who cares about my students' success.

participant_2.background:
I've always been afraid of heights, but I overcame my fear when I went bungee jumping.
My job allows me to be myself and be creative.
i am a lifestyle blogger.
i m dumpy.
i eat mainly chinese food.

content.text: I hope you have a great day! I have to work, but I'm bringing my blender to make my own iced coffee!
Thank you! I hope you have a great day too! I work as a lifestyle blogger, so I get to be creative and be myself. What do you do for work?
I am a teacher and I love it! I love working with kids and helping them learn.
That's so great! I have always been afraid of heights, but I overcame my fear when I went bungee jumping.
Wow, that's so brave! I'm not sure I would ever be able to do that!
I'm glad I did it! It was a really fun experience. Do you have any hobbies?
I enjoy cooking and baking. I also love to read and spend time with my family.
I love to cook too! I'm not very good at baking, but I love to try new recipes.
That's great! I love trying new recipes too. It's always fun to see what you can come up with.
I agree! It's a great way to learn new things and explore different cultures.
I love learning new things! I'm always looking for ways to grow and learn.
Me too! I think it's important to keep learning and growing as a person.
